title: Fresh Fruit Punch

ingredients.content: 24 oz fresh pineapple chunks, plus extra to garnish
14 oz fresh strawberries, hulled, plus extra to garnish

preparations.content: Place water and sugar into mixing bowl and cook <b>4 min/212Â°F/speed 0.5<b>.
Add pineapple, strawberries and orange and chop <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. With a fine mesh sieve, strain juice mixture over a large pitcher and refrigerate to chill.
Garnish with pineapple and/or strawberries and serve chilled.
